Jargon Term: to get the extra fluid off of your body
Overall, your medical condition is much improved, but because you are very weak you will be discharged to a rehabilitation center.

You will not be discharged on water pills, but Dr. [**Last Name (STitle) **] and the physicians at the rehabilitation center will be monitoring your fluid status very closely and will restart the water pills if your weight starts to increase meaning that you are holding on to too much fluid.
